root.name: Soldiers at War
root.description: In Soldiers at War, you take control of eight nab squads through a campaign of fifteen historical missions, being started in Africa and ending up in Germany. Through the missions, your soldiers will become more experienced and can take items with them to following missions, allowing you to build up more powerfull and well-equipped forces by the end of war. Soldiers at War is a turn based strategy-shooter in the same vein as XCOM: UFO defense. Players start off each turn with a squad with a limited number of action points. These points can be used to move, shoot, or perform some other action.
